ECSchema.description: Custom attributes that customize ECDb's ECSchema to database mapping.

ECProperty.description: Defines how the ECClass is mapped to table(s). Values: OwnTable (default), TablePerHierarchy, ExistingTable, NotMapped
If MapStrategy is ExistingTable provide the table name here
Optionally specify custom 'primary key' column which must be of type Int64.

ECClass.description: Specify database index for a ECClass based on list of properties of that class.

ECProperty.description: Optional name of the index. Must follow EC identifier rules. It need to be globally unique in database.
Default: false. If true, all values in the indexed properties must be unique.

ECArrayProperty.description: List of properties that make up the index. Only primitive type properties are supported.
List of indexes on properties of this class. It can be use to improve query performance or to add unique constraint.

ECProperty.description: Possible values: NoAction (default), Cascade (which deletes child rows when parent row is deleted), SetNull(foreign key property in child is set to NULL), Restrict (cannot delete parent if it still has children).
Possible values: NoAction (default), Cascade (which updates child foreign key when parent primary key is updated).

ECClass.description: Maps subclasses and their children to a joined table. Can only be applied to classes in a hierarchy using MapStrategy TablePerHierarchy.

ECProperty.description: Optional. If not set, a default column name will be used
Optional. If not set, a default column name will be used
Default: false. If set to true duplicate relationships are allowed.
If not specified, the ECProperty name is used. It must follow EC Identifier specification.
If false, values must not be unset for this property.
Only allow unique values for this property.

Specifies how string comparisons should work for this property. Possible values: Binary (default): bit to bit matching. NoCase: The same as binary, except that the 26 upper case characters of ASCII are folded to their lower case equivalents before comparing. Note that it only folds ASCII characters. RTrim: The same as binary, except that trailing space characters are ignored.

ECClass.description: Specifies a prefix for generated tables. If not specified, namespacePrefix of the ECSchema is used

ECProperty.description: The prefix should be 2-4 letters followed by an underbar, e.g. plnt_.

ECClass.description: Allows to share columns amongst ECProperties. Can only be applied to MapStrategy TablePerHierarchy

ECProperty.description: False (Default):Columns are shared for the properties of the ECClass to which this CA is applied and all its subclasses. True: Columns are not shared for this ECClass but for all of its subclasses.
Number of shared columns to use before using overflow tables (optional). Default: 0.
Number of shared columns of each overflow table (optional). If not specified, a default will be used.

ECClass.description: Indicates that the ECInstanceId of the constraint ECClass of the ECRelationshipClass is to be used as foreign key.
